mgui.interfaces.math

Class MathExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • mgui.interfaces.math.MathExpression

  • public class MathExpression
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents a mathematical expression, and methods to evaluate it. This is based upon the Jep Java - Math Expression Parser v 4.2.1, issued under the GNU Public License. JEP has since switched to a commercial license.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Reid

      static java.lang.Object evaluate(MathExpressionOptions options)
      Evaluates a mathematical expression, returning an array of doubles, if n < 3, otherwise returns a set of embedded ArrayList<Double>s.
